snippet.title: Crimson Desert - Gameplay Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description: Explore the vast open world of Crimson Desert in this latest trailer for the upcoming action-adventure game from developer Pearl Abyss. Check it out to see gameplay, including scaling walls and giant creatures, horseback riding, combat, cuddling cats, and much more. Crimson Desert will be available on console and PC.
